pullrequest.title: Add basic support for gnu precompiled headers

content.raw: Good, thanks. It might be then a good idea to ask @nkoenig or somebody who has access to the CI machines to run some automated builds to see if we haven't broken something and if it works with more build types. But I'm not sure if the CI machines use PCHs or not.
content.html: Good, thanks. It might be then a good idea to ask @nkoenig or somebody who has access to the CI machines to run some automated builds to see if we haven't broken something and if it works with more build types. But I'm not sure if the CI machines use PCHs or not.
